original_text: And the suburbs of the cities, which ye shall give unto the Levites, shall reach from the wall of the city and outward a thousand cubits round about.
korean_text: 너희가 레위인에게 줄 성읍들의 들은 성벽에서부터 밖으로 사방 천 규빗이라

sentences.original_text: And the suburbs of the cities
which ye shall give unto the Levites
shall reach from the wall of the city
and outward a thousand cubits round about
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 바깥으로 사방 천 규빗까지 이를 것이다
